longBusinessSummary: James Maritime Holdings, Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides professional security personnel services enhanced by smartphone-based security applications. The company offers professional security services and guard service contracts for armed and unarmed security services. It provides personal protective products, such as hard armor plates, tactical ballistic plate carriers, soft armor inserts and vests, helmets, shields, and other ballistic products and accessories through mail-in orders and e-commerce. In addition, the company offers government contracting services. It serves federal, state, and local law enforcement agencies; first responders; national armed forces; and independent security contractors. The company was formerly known as Out-Takes, Inc. and changed its name to James Maritime Holdings, Inc. in February 2015. James Maritime Holdings, Inc. was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Sandy, Utah.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Kip  Eardley
